K12D0440_H0414:325b-10: so ma skyes pa'i byis pa'i lce blang sa la /

K12D0440_H0414:325b-13: de nas de ril bu byas nas mar khu chen
K12D0440_H0414:325b-14: po dang btsos nas de nas nyi ma bdun dngul
K12D0440_H0414:325b-15: chu'i nang du bzhag pa dang /

K12D0440_H0414:325b-18: byi la'i khrag bskus nas bskams pa dang /
K12D0440_H0414:325b-20: ce sbyang gi sha rnams mnyes nas ril bu byas
K12D0440_H0414:325b-21: pa btsos te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur
K12D0440_H0414:325b-23: 'di shin tu ngo mtshar ba rnams so //
K12D0440_H0414:325b-26: de bzhin du na g'a ra dang /
K12D0440_H0414:326a-1: lo ma'i khu ba rnams btags nas ril bu byas na ril bu'i mchog go /
K12D0440_H0414:326a-3: bcu drug nam gcig tu gzhug pa ni tshil chen dang /
K12D0440_H0414:326a-4: 'dzo ti sa ma'i mar khu drug nam bzhi bram ze'i thod par mnyes pa dang /
K12D0440_H0414:326a-5: ghing he ka'i mar khu dang /
K12D0440_H0414:326a-6: sol ba'i lo ma'i khu ba lus la byugs na nges par mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0440_H0414:326a-7: bal po'i zangs kyi snod du ba'i mar bskol ba dang /

K12D0440_H0414:326a-15: bdun bzlas pas gsol ba btab na ril bu'i dngos
K12D0440_H0414:326a-17: gzhan du ni ma yin no //

K12D0440_H0414:326a-19: sna tshogs yongs su brjod pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //

K12D0440_H0414:326b-0: btags te @326b ri lu byas nas mid na mi

K12D0440_H0414:326b-7: rgyu skar mgo la kun da'i rtsa ba dang /

K12D0440_H0414:326b-10: te / lha mo'i sngags brjod na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0440_H0414:326b-11: rtag par byas te ji srid du 'o ma nag
K12D0440_H0414:326b-12: por song song gi bar du bzhag na 'grub par

K12D0440_H0414:326b-27: bzhag na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0440_H0414:326b-29: kan dzi 'thungs na de ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0440_H0414:327a-15: bzung ste / gza' lhag pa la rin po che'i

K12D0440_H0414:328a-28: nyi ma dang po'i dus su dngul chu dang /

K12D0440_H0414:341a-6: pa grub pa thob pa'i gnas der bho dzya de

K12D0440_H0414:365b-10: btung ba dang ldan par rnal 'byor ma dang stabs gcig na /

K12D0440_H0414:366a-19: gis 'phrul la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
